physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features six military personnel
 of which one is a female and the other five are males. Two of the men are squatting down while the other four stand behind. They are all clad in military uniforms and looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. The man who is squatting down on the left hand side is cradling a dog in his arms. The background of the photograph shows greenery and trees.
